feed.title: Thomas Armstrong
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive and feature-rich Jekyll theme for technical writing.

entry.title: Shift Equivariant Vision Transformers
entry.summary: For my undergraduate research, I worked on making a shift equivariant Vision Transformer. This would allow vision transformers to better classify images that are different than those it trained on by only a slight shift.

entry.title: Comparing Various Deep Learning Techniques for Image Classification

link.title: Comparing Various Deep Learning Techniques for Image Classification

entry.summary:
For my data science class’ final project, I chose to compare the performance of different deep learning architectures on the classic MNIST dataset. In the project, I used a convolutional neural network and a dense network.
View it here
